alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 5:39AM PST until January 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow is expected in the foothills. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are expected above 3000 feet. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery and dangerous road conditions are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may affect travel on portions of Highway 14 and Highway 138. There is a chance that snow could reach the Antelope Valley floor at times late tonight and Monday, with a dusting of snow possible in some areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
